answers.answer: Due to severe anxiety i get them a lot you feel your heart speeding up Sometimes  you get shortness of breath it's in my case i feel my heart so strong like its gonna pop out feels like I'm dying but honestly the more thought you out into the worse it gets whats helped me a little is to breath in for 5 seconds hokd it for two ket out for ten breathing really helps take your mind off of it
I have anxiety disorder and I've had preeclampsia... your symptoms sound like preeclampsia to me.

Thank you both. I just got admitted into labor and delivery, they're running urine and blood tests. My blood count was low, I'm currently being given iron through an IV. I was having contractions earlier but they've become regular (every 6 minutes maybe). So they're calling in my ob.
It also sounds like the symptoms for anemia. Hope e
That was supposed to say hope everything turns out all right.
If you don't know if you had a panic attack or not chances are you don't have it! I struggle from panic disorder and I LITTERALLY think I'm dying and its a serious few minutes of panic and horror

question: I've posted before about having headaches, heart palpitations, seeing stars and having a blood pressure reading of 146/94. My doctor ordered an ultrasound for "excessive fetal growth", but he was closed today, so I spoke to another doctor. He said it sounds like I'm having panic attacks. ??? I've never had them. And I've never seen them. I don't feel like that's what it is. Anybody else have them? Or think they do?
title: Panic attacks? Sound right?
